content.content1: Times the word "in" was used in the speech in which David Cameron announced Britain would have a referendum
content.content2: Times the word "out" was used in the same speech
content.content3: The number of years after which UK citizens living in the EU, but outside the UK (of which there are 2.3 million) can't vote in the referendum.
content.content4: The UK's net contribution to the EU in 2015.
content.content5: The proportion of people in the other 27 EU countries who say it "doesn't matter" whether the UK leaves or not.
